mil5.3.9:2.2_0: Taṁ ve naraṁ samaṇaṁ āhu loke’ti.
mil5.3.9:3.1_0: Tatrime cattāro dhammā khanti appāhāratā rativippahānaṁ ākiñcaññaṁ.
mil5.3.9:3.3_0: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, āsavānaṁ khayā samaṇo hoti,
mil5.3.9:3.3_2: taṁ ve naraṁ samaṇaṁ āhu loke’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.9:3.4_0: Yadi catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūto samaṇo hoti,
mil5.3.9:3.4_1: tena hi ‘āsavānaṁ khayā samaṇo hotī’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā,
mil5.3.9:3.4_2: ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.9:4.3_1: taṁ ve naraṁ samaṇaṁ āhu loke’ti.
mil5.3.9:4.4_1: vacanaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ puggalānaṁ guṇavasena bhaṇitaṁ—
mil5.3.9:4.5_1: taṁ ve naraṁ samaṇaṁ āhu loke’ti,
mil5.3.9:4.5_2: idaṁ pana niravasesavacanaṁ ‘āsavānaṁ khayā samaṇo hotī’ti.
mil5.3.9:5.1_2: te sabbe upādāyupādāya samaṇo khīṇāsavo aggamakkhāyati.
mil5.3.9:5.2_3: avasesāni yāni kānici vividhāni pupphajātāni, sabbāni tāni pupphāniyeva,
mil5.3.9:5.2_4: upādāyupādāya pana vassikaṁyeva pupphaṁ janassa patthitaṁ pihayitaṁ;
mil5.3.9:5.3_2: te sabbe upādāyupādāya samaṇo khīṇāsavo aggamakkhāyati.
mil5.3.9:6.2_2: te sabbe upādāyupādāya samaṇo khīṇāsavo aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
